title: Action causes ping spikes
body:
I might just not understand how this stuff works, but why does my ping spike in skirmishes and team fights?

It's close to 100% repeatable and spikes from ( an admittedly awesome) 22ms constantly when nothing is going on, to 200+ as soon as the action actually starts.

replies.body:
There are a couple of things I can think of that would be worth looking into:

1. Something on your home network / internet connection is flaky, and causing network issues at these times.
 * Go through the steps in [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and see if that helps
 * Try switching to an ethernet connection [if you are on wifi](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/ethernet-vs-wifi-ping-packets-playing-better)
2. Something on your PC is getting overloaded when more intense stuff is happening on the screen.
 * Questions to ask yourself - 
 * What spec PC do you have? Does it meet the [minimum spec](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) for LoL?
 * Are all your drivers (especially chipset + network) up to date?
 * If the source is PC performance related - going through the same steps in our [low FPS troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide might help.

Let me know how you go!
